title: The scientist
lyric:
Questions of science
Science and progress
Do not speak as loud as my heart

title: Clocks
lyric:

Tides that I tried to swim against
Have brought me down upon my knees

title: Like a G6
lyric:

When we drink, we do it right gettin' slizzard

title: Rollin in the Deep
lyric:

Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark
Finally I can see you crystal clear
Go 'head and sell me out and I'll lay your ship bare

title: DJ's got us fallin' in love
lyric:

With our bodies rockin' from side to side (side to side)
Thank God the week is done
I feel like a zombie comin' back to life (back to life)

title: Song for the Dumped
lyric:
Wish I hadn't bought you dinner
Right before you dumped me
On your front porch
Give me my money back
Give me my money back
You bitch

title: Gold Digger
lyric:

Win the Super Bowl and drive off in a Hyundai

title: Ms. Jackson
lyric:
I am for real
Didn’t mean to make your daughter cry
I apologize a million times…

title: Man on the Moon
lyric:

Now, Andy did you hear about this one?

title: It's Now or Never
lyric:
Come hold me tight
Kiss me my darling
Be mine tonight
Tomorrow will be too late

title: You Get What You Give
lyric:
Wake up kids

Age 14 we got you down on your knees

title: Drops of Jupiter
lyric:
Since the return of her stay on the moon
She listens like spring and she talks like June, hey, hey  Hey, hey

title: If it Makes You Happy
lyric:

You listen to Coltrane, derail your own train
Well, who hasn't been there before?

title: The One I Love
lyric:

A simple prop to occupy my time

title: Teen Spirit
lyric:
With the lights out, it's less dangerous
Here we are now, entertain us
I feel stupid and contagious
Here we are now, entertain us

title: Wonder Wall
lyric:
And all the roads we have to walk are winding
And all the lights that lead us there are blinding
There are many things that I Would like to say to you but I don't know how

title: I Only Wanna Be With You
lyric:
You and me, we come from different worlds
You like to laugh at me when I look at other girls
Sometimes you're crazy and you wonder why
I'm such a baby 'cause the dolphins make me cry

title: One Headlight
lyric:
This place is old
It feels just like a beat up truck
I turn the engine, but the engine doesn't turn
Well it smells of cheap wine, cigarettes
This place is always such a mess
Sometimes I think I'd like to watch it burn

title: Hey Jealousy
lyric:
Tell me do you think it'd be all right
If I could just crash here tonight
You can see I'm in no shape for driving
And anyway I've got no place to go

title: Name
lyric:
Scars are souvenirs you never lose
The past is never far
Did you lose yourself somewhere out there
Did you get to be a star

And I don't even care to shake these zipper blues
And we don't know just where our bones will rest
To dust I guess
Forgotten and absorbed into the earth below

title: No Rain
lyric:
All I can say is that my life is pretty plain
I like watchin' the puddles gather rain
And all I can do is just pour some tea for two
And speak my point of view but it's not sane

title: Learn to Fly
lyric:
Now I'm looking to the sky to save me
Looking for a sign of life
Looking for something to help me burn out bright

title: Creep
lyric:
You're just like an angel
Your skin makes me cry
You float like a feather
In a beautiful world I wish I was special

title: Superbase
lyric:
Excuse me, you're a hell of a guy
You know I really got a thing for American guys
I mean, sigh, sickenin' eyes
I can tell that you're in touch with your feminine side
Oh yes I did, Yes I did

title: Everybody Wants to Rule the World
lyric:
Welcome to your life
There's no turning back

We will find

Turn your back on mother nature

title: Congratulations

If you fuck with winning, put your lighters to the sky

title: Old Town Road
lyric:
I got the horses in the back
Horse tack is attached
Hat is matte black
Got the boots that's black to match

title: Starboy
lyric:
House so empty, need a centerpiece
Twenty racks a table cut from ebony
Cut that ivory into skinny pieces
Then she clean it with her face  man I love my baby

title: Hotline Bling
lyric:
Cause ever since I left the city, you Started wearing less and goin' out more

Hangin' with some girls I've never seen before

title: I took a Pill in Ibiza

I'm living out in LA
I drive a sports car just to prove

title: Royals
lyric:

No post code envy

title: Thrift Shop
lyric:

I look incredible

title: Blurred Lines
lyric:
I feel so lucky
Hey, hey, hey
You wanna hug me
Hey, hey, hey

title: You're so Vain
lyric:

And one of them was me

Clouds in my coffee

title: Can't Get Enough of Your Love
lyric:
Tell me, what can I say?
What am I gonna do?

title: Take on Me
lyric:
So needless to say I'm odds and ends
But I'll be stumbling away
Slowly learning that life is okay
Say after me

title: Sledgehammer
lyric:

If you'd just lay down your tracks

title: I Wanna Dance with Somebody
lyric:

So when the night falls

title: Livin' on a Prayer

She brings home her pay,for love

title: Karma Chameleon

I'm a man who doesn't know

title: Have You Ever Seen the Rain?
lyric:

There's a calm before the storm

title: Sittin' by the Dock of the Bay
lyric:
Sittin in the morning sun
I`ll be sittin' when the evening come

title: Pretty Woman
lyric:
I guess I'll go on home, it's late

title: Mrs. Robinson

Going to the candidates' debate

title: Heard it Through the Grapevine
lyric:

title: Take it Easy
lyric:

Four that wanna own me

title: Satisfaction
lyric:

title: Ain't too Proud to Beg
lyric:

title: Stayin' Alive

And you may look the other way

title: What a Fool Believes
artist: Michael McDonald and the Doobie Brothers

title: Eye of the Tiger

title: Wake Me Up Before You Go Go
lyric:

title: With Or Without You
lyric:
Sleight of hand and twist of fate
On a bed of nails she makes me wait

title: It's Friday I'm in Love
lyric:

Tuesday's gray and Wednesday too
Thursday I don't care about you

title: Killing Me Softly
lyric:

Trying to find some money, then you die.

title: Poison
